snippet: Whiskey stones, which chill a drink instead of ice, are proving to be a resilient product, even increasing in popularity.
abstract: Whiskey stones, soapstone rocks which chill a drink instead of ice, are proving to be a resilient product, even increasing in popularity.
lead_paragraph: Whiskey stones, which chill a drink instead of ice, are proving to be a resilient product, even increasing in popularity.

headline.seo: Soapstone Rocks to Chill Whiskey Endure, Despite Criticism
headline.main: Rocks Don’t Melt, Nor Do Their Fans
headline.print_headline: Rocks Don’t Melt, Nor Do Their Fans
